thread.title: Coming Distractions: Arnold Schwarzenegger is out for revenge in the trailer for Aftermath
thread.title_full: Coming Distractions: Arnold Schwarzenegger is out for revenge in the trailer for Aftermath

author: Sam Barsanti
title: Coming Distractions: Arnold Schwarzenegger is out for revenge in the trailer for Aftermath
text:
Share Tweet 
Arnold Schwarzenegger has a good amount of things to be angry about these days, specifically the poor ratings of his version of The Apprentice and Donald Trump sniping at him about those poor ratings. And in this trailer for his upcoming movie Aftermath , he has an even better reason to be pissed off. In the trailer, he plays a regular, muscle-bound man with an Austrian accent whose family dies in a tragic plane crash that was caused by the negligence of an air traffic controller played by Scoot McNairy. But when the airplane company tries to pay him off with a few thousand dollars and sends McNairy to a new life where he can be freed from his guilt, Schwarzenegger flips out. Granted, this looks like more of a grown-up thriller than your usual Schwarzenegger action movie, but theyâ€™ll probably save the scene where he kills McNairy with a minigun for the actual film. 
Aftermath was directed by Elliott Lester, and it will be in theaters on April 7.
